intro: Cyrtandra kinhoi, commonly known as the Kauai cyrtandra, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its small, showy flowers that typically bloom in shades of pink or white. The plant has oval-shaped leaves with a slightly hairy texture and is often found growing in moist, shaded environments. It plays an important role in the ecological balance of its native habitat. Due to habitat loss, it is considered endangered and is protected under conservation efforts.
